summary: 0xPA DAO - 0xPA DAO focuses on software development, digital property, and ownership rights. Our flagship project is a novel analytical vehicle designed to increase end user investment optimization beginning with the Vulcan Blockchain. Our unique NFT keys provide SaaS access with perpetual software licensing. Full utilization of the NFT Key enables the holder to retain their access to the SaaS while simultaneously renting out access to the software suite, empowering the holder to generate revenue with their own digital property.
